overview: Naina, a 36 year old women lives with her niece, Dua who is 19-year-old. They want to rent out their guest room. On the other hand there's Shahab and Ghouri, two friends, and struggling actors who are unable to pay the rent for the last two months. For that Shahab puts on makeup and becomes his own uncle and calls himself Ahmed Kamal. After a few interactions Naina falls in love with Shahab (Ahmed Kamal). Shahab is now truly in love with Dua and he now wants to come clean and tell her the truth that there is no Kamal, in fact he created this character just to get the room on rent.
title: Filmy Siyappa
